data.name: CBT With Yuuka Kazami: Patchouli Knowledge's Surprise
data.detailed_description:
You decide to seek out someone who's been looking for you, that person is none other then Patchouli Knowledge! She seems to have a surprise prepared, but what could it be?

Features:
-Impeccable writing!
-Captivating OST that makes you feel comfy!
-Cute art!
data.about_the_game:
You decide to seek out someone who's been looking for you, that person is none other then Patchouli Knowledge! She seems to have a surprise prepared, but what could it be?

data.short_description: Patchouli Knowledge has something to show you! What could it be, I wonder?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
